description: Foundation setup for buio template migration: npm dependencies, self-hosted fonts, color tokens, and all foundation components (elements, containers, head, icons, scripts).

userStories.title: Add npm dependencies for buio migration
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to install all required npm packages so that buio components can function properly.
userStories.notes: Run pnpm install after modifying package.json

userStories.title: Download and setup self-hosted fonts
userStories.description: As a developer, I want fonts self-hosted instead of Google CDN so that the site has better privacy and performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Geist variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/geist/
Geist Mono variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/geist-mono/
EB Garamond variable font (woff2) is in public/fonts/eb-garamond/
Fonts include regular and italic variants where applicable
userStories.notes: Download fonts from Google Fonts or fontsource. Use variable fonts for smaller bundle size.

userStories.title: Create Fonts.astro with @font-face declarations
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a Fonts component with proper @font-face declarations so that fonts load correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: @font-face for Geist Mono with font-display: swap
@font-face for EB Garamond with font-display: swap
No external CDN URLs in the component
userStories.notes: Copy from buio/src/components/fundations/head/Fonts.astro and replace Google Fonts URLs with local paths

userStories.title: Setup color token remapping in global.css
userStories.description: As a developer, I want buio color tokens remapped to NextNode brand colors so that components use our branding.
acceptanceCriteria: All buio color variables have NextNode equivalents
Dark mode tokens are included if present in buio
userStories.notes: Add to existing src/styles/global.css. Check buio's color system first.

userStories.title: Import Button.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Button component imported so that I can use consistent button styles.
acceptanceCriteria: All variants work: default, accent, muted, link, none
All sizes work: xxs, xs, sm, md, lg, xl
Props are properly typed with TypeScript interface
Colors use NextNode tokens (remapped from buio)
Tests cover all variants and sizes

userStories.title: Import Text.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Text component imported so that I can use consistent typography.
acceptanceCriteria: Props are properly typed with TypeScript interface

userStories.title: Import Wrapper.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Wrapper container component so that I can use consistent content widths.
acceptanceCriteria: Props are properly typed with TypeScript interface
Max-width values match buio design system

userStories.title: Import BaseHead.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the BaseHead component so that pages have proper head setup.
acceptanceCriteria: Imports other head components (Fonts, Meta, etc.)

userStories.title: Import Favicons.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Favicons component so that the site has proper favicon configuration.

userStories.title: Import Meta.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Meta component so that pages have proper meta tags.

userStories.title: Import Seo.astro component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Seo component with @astrolib/seo integration so that pages are SEO optimized.
acceptanceCriteria: Supports Open Graph and Twitter cards

userStories.title: Import Menu.astro icon component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Menu icon so that the mobile navigation has a hamburger menu.

userStories.title: Import Close.astro icon component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Close icon so that modals and menus can be dismissed.

userStories.title: Import ChevronLeft.astro icon component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the ChevronLeft icon for navigation elements.

userStories.title: Import ChevronRight.astro icon component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the ChevronRight icon for navigation elements.

userStories.title: Import Plus.astro icon component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Plus icon for FAQ accordions.

userStories.title: Import AosHead.astro script component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the AOS head script importing from npm so that scroll animations work.
acceptanceCriteria: Imports AOS CSS from node_modules (not CDN)
userStories.notes: Modify buio version to import from 'aos/dist/aos.css' instead of CDN

userStories.title: Import AosBody.astro script component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the AOS body script importing from npm so that scroll animations initialize.
acceptanceCriteria: Imports AOS JS from node_modules (not CDN)
userStories.notes: Modify buio version to import from 'aos' package instead of CDN

userStories.title: Import KeenSlider.astro script component
userStories.description: As a developer, I want the Keen Slider script importing from npm so that carousels work.
userStories.notes: Modify buio version to import from 'keen-slider' package instead of CDN

userStories.title: Create PR to main for foundation phase
userStories.description: As a developer, I want a PR created so that the foundation work can be reviewed and merged.
acceptanceCriteria: All previous stories in this PRD pass
PR is created with gh pr create
PR title follows convention: feat(buio): foundation setup
PR description lists all components added
userStories.notes: Use gh pr create --title 'feat(buio): foundation setup' --body '...'
